Generate Pages on Demand

Instantly generate content on any topic. Here's how:

  • By URL: Add your topic to the site's address in your browser bar (e.g., {{SITE_BASE_URL}}desired-page-topic). A new page will be generated.
  • By Search: Type any topic into the search bar above and press Enter or click Search. A new page will be generated.

Heads up: This thing's currently wired up to make pages for Shaffer Construction, but feel free to go wild and try to make some funny stuff if you want. Any page you make stays up, btw. Go nuts!
